text: Iwo amene amasunga Mpando wachifumu ndiponso iwo amene amauzungulira iwo, amatamanda Ambuye wawo ndi kukhulupirira mwa Iye ndipo amapempha chitetezo m’malo mwa iwo amene akhulupirira. “Ambuye wathu! Chifundo ndi nzeru zanu zimakhudza aliyense kotero atetezeni onse amene adza kwa Inu ndi kutsatira njira yanu ndiponso apulumutseni iwo ku chilango cha ku Gahena!”
